mapper.select: SELECT C.TITLE, COUNT(CVH.CONTENT_ID) AS VIEW_COUNT FROM CONTENT_VIEW_HISTORY CVH INNER JOIN CONTENT C ON CVH.CONTENT_ID = C.ID GROUP BY CVH.CONTENT_ID ORDER BY VIEW_COUNT DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT C.ID AS CONTENT_ID, CASE WHEN CFP.ID != NULL THEN 0 ELSE C.PRICE END AS PAYMENT_PRICE, CFP.ID AS PROMOTION_ID, C.IS_ADULT AS IS_ADULT_CONTENT FROM CONTENT C LEFT JOIN CONTENT_FREE_PROMOTION CFP ON C.ID = CFP.CONTENT_ID WHERE C.ID = #{contentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONTENT_PURCHASE (ID, USER_ID, CONTENT_ID, PROMOTION_ID, PAYMENT_PRICE) VALUES (UUID(), #{userId}, #{contentInfo.contentId}, #{contentInfo.promotionId}, #{contentInfo.paymentPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT CP.CONTENT_ID, C.TITLE, COUNT(*) AS PURCHASE_COUNT FROM CONTENT_PURCHASE CP INNER JOIN CONTENT C ON CP.CONTENT_ID = C.ID GROUP BY CP.CONTENT_ID ORDER BY PURCHASE_COUNT DESC LIMIT 10
